Biasing/src/TargetBremFilter.cxx
00001 /*
00002  * @file TargetBremFilter.cxx
00003  * @class TargetBremFilter
00004  * @brief Class defining a UserActionPlugin that allows a user to filter out 
00005  *        events that don't result in a brem within the target.
00006  * @author Omar Moreno, SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory
00007  */
00008 
00009 #include "Biasing/TargetBremFilter.h"
00010 
00011 namespace ldmx { 
00012 
00013     std::vector<G4Track*> TargetBremFilter::bremGammaTracks_ = {};
00014 
00015     extern "C" TargetBremFilter* createTargetBremFilter() {
00016         return new TargetBremFilter;
00017     }
00018 
00019     extern "C" void destroyTargetBremFilter(TargetBremFilter* object) {
00020         delete object;
00021     }
00022 
00023     TargetBremFilter::TargetBremFilter() {
00024         messenger_ = new TargetBremFilterMessenger(this);
00025     }
00026 
00027     TargetBremFilter::~TargetBremFilter() {
00028     }
00029 
00030     G4ClassificationOfNewTrack TargetBremFilter::stackingClassifyNewTrack(
00031             const G4Track* track, 
00032             const G4ClassificationOfNewTrack& currentTrackClass) {
00033 
00034         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/ 
00035         /*std::cout << "*   Track pushed to the stack  *" << std::endl;*/
00036         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/
00037 
00038         // get the PDGID of the track.
00039         G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00040 
00041         // Get the particle type.
00042         G4String particleName = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetParticleName();
00043 
00044         /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: " << "\n" 
00045                     << "\tParticle " << particleName << " ( PDG ID: " << pdgID << " ) : " << "\n"
00046                     << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID() << "\n" 
00047                     << std::endl;*/
00048 
00049 
00050         // Use current classification by default so values from other plugins are not overridden.
00051         G4ClassificationOfNewTrack classification = currentTrackClass;
00052 
00053         if (track->GetTrackID() == 1 && pdgID == 11) {
00055             return fWaiting; 
00056         }
00057 
00058         return classification;
00059     }
00060 
00061     void TargetBremFilter::stepping(const G4Step* step) { 
00062 
00063         // Get the track associated with this step.
00064         G4Track* track = step->GetTrack();
00065 
00066         // Only process the primary electron track
00067         if (track->GetParentID() != 0) return;
00068 
00069         // get the PDGID of the track.
00070         G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00071         
00072         // Make sure that the particle being processed is an electron.
00073         if (pdgID != 11) return; // Throw an exception
00074 
00075         // Get the volume the particle is in.
00076         G4VPhysicalVolume* volume = track->GetVolume();
00077         G4String volumeName = volume->GetName();
00078 
00079         // Get the particle type.
00080         G4String particleName = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetParticleName();
00081 
00082         // Get the kinetic energy of the particle.
00083         //double incidentParticleEnergy = step->GetPostStepPoint()->GetTotalEnergy();
00084         /*std::cout << "*******************************" << std::endl;*/ 
00085         /*std::cout << "*   Step " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << std::endl;*/
00086         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/
00087 
00088         /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: " << "\n" 
00089                     << "\tTotal energy of " << particleName      << " ( PDG ID: " << pdgID
00090                     << " ) : " << incidentParticleEnergy       << "\n"
00091                     << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID()     << "\n" 
00092                     << "\tStep #: " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << "\n"
00093                     << "\tParticle currently in " << volumeName  
00094                     << "\tPost step process: " << step->GetPostStepPoint()->GetStepStatus() 
00095                     << std::endl;*/
00096  
00097         // If the particle isn't in the target, don't continue with the processing.
00098         if (volumeName.compareTo(volumeName_) != 0) return;
00099 
00100         // Check if the particle is exiting the volume.
00101         if (step->GetPostStepPoint()->GetStepStatus() == fGeomBoundary) { 
00102            
00103             // Clear all of the gamma tracks remaining from the previous event.
00104             TargetBremFilter::bremGammaTracks_.clear();
00105 
00106             /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00107                         << "Particle " << particleName << "is leaving the "
00108                         << volumeName << " volume with momentum "
00109                         << track->GetMomentum().mag() << std::endl;*/
00110             
00111             if (track->GetMomentum().mag() >= recoilEnergyThreshold_) { 
00112                 /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00113                             << "Electron energy is above threshold --> Aborting event."
00114                             << std::endl;*/
00115                 
00116                 track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00117                 G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00118                 return;
00119             
00120             }
00121 
00122             // Get the particles daughters.
00123             const G4TrackVector* secondaries = step->GetSecondary();
00124            
00125             /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00126                         << "Incident " << particleName  << " produced " << secondaries->size() 
00127                         << " secondaries." << std::endl;*/
00128            
00129           
00130             // If the particle didn't produce any secondaries, stop processing
00131             // the event.
00132             if (secondaries->size() == 0) { 
00133                 /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00134                             << "Primary did not produce secondaries --> Killing primary track!" 
00135                             << std::endl;*/
00136                 
00137                 track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00138                 G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00139                 return;
00140             }
00141        
00142             bool hasBremCandidate = false; 
00143             for (auto& secondary_track : *secondaries) {
00144                 G4String processName = secondary_track->GetCreatorProcess()->GetProcessName();
00145                 /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00146                             << "Secondary produced via process " << processName 
00147                             << std::endl;*/
00148                 if (processName.compareTo("eBrem") == 0 
00149                         && secondary_track->GetKineticEnergy() > bremEnergyThreshold_) {
00150                     /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: " 
00151                                 << "Adding secondary to brem list." << std::endl;*/
00152                     TargetBremFilter::bremGammaTracks_.push_back(secondary_track); 
00153                     hasBremCandidate = true;
00154                 } 
00155             }
00156 
00157             if (!hasBremCandidate) { 
00158                 /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00159                             << "The secondaries are not a result of Brem. --> Killing all tracks!"
00160                             << std::endl;*/
00161 
00162                 track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00163                 G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00164                 return;
00165             }
00166 
00167             // Check if the recoil electron should be killed.  If not, postpone 
00168             // its processing until the brem gamma has been processed.
00169             if (killRecoilElectron_) { 
00170                 /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: Killing electron track."
00171                             << std::endl;*/ 
00172 
00173                 track->SetTrackStatus(fStopAndKill);
00174             } else track->SetTrackStatus(fSuspend);  
00175 
00176         } else if (step->GetPostStepPoint()->GetKineticEnergy() == 0) { 
00177             /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: "
00178                         << "Electron never made it out of the target --> Killing all tracks!"
00179                         << std::endl;*/
00180 
00181             track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00182             G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00183             return;
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187     void TargetBremFilter::endEvent(const G4Event*) {
00188         bremGammaTracks_.clear();
00189     }
00190     
00191     void TargetBremFilter::removeBremFromList(G4Track* track) {   
00192         bremGammaTracks_.erase(std::remove(bremGammaTracks_.begin(), 
00193                     bremGammaTracks_.end(), track), bremGammaTracks_.end());
00194     }
00195 }
